remarks: The sum of two infinite series.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement:

seradd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.

seradd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) + ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
